snippet.title: Bulwark: Falconeer Chronicles - Official Gameplay Overview | The MIX Showcase 2023
snippet.description: Join Tomas Sala, creator of Bulwark: Falconeer Chronicles, for a gameplay walkthrough of the upcoming city-building game set in the oceanic world of The Great Ursee. Sala gives a tour of the world, including building a command tower, a combat encounter, and more. A demo for Bulwark: Falconeer Chronicles is available now.
